content.rendered:
Introducing our Signature Posies, a petite English garden-style arrangement inspired by the charm of traditional English gardens, highlighting the finest seasonal flowers available in our studio each day. A posy style arrangement, tightly packed with the season’s pretties, and elegant perfumed notes.

Finished with our signature wrap and trailing ribbon, OR with the option to presented in a contemporary glass vase.

The beauty of nature lies in its diversity, and we embrace this philosophy. All L&R designs are unique and one-of-a-kind. Images provided are for illustrative purposes only. The posy you receive will depend on the season and availability. Place your trust in us to choose the finest flowers to convey your sentiments.

Size guide ~ Plinth diameter 32cm
Standard option pictured

GST Included. Delivery calculated at checkout.
